original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
